articles.author: Riley Cardoza
articles.title: Chris Evans and wife Alba Baptista quietly welcome their first child - Page Six
articles.description: The “Captain America” star, 44, married the actress, 28, in 2023. The couple enjoyed two weddings — one in Portugal and another in Massachusetts.
articles.content:
Chris Evans is taking on a new role — fatherhood.
The “Captain America” star, 44, welcomed his first child with wife Alba Baptista over the weekend, TMZ reported Tuesday.
The couple’s baby was born… [+2194 chars]
